text: (Oh Muhammad!) bacelele intethelelo noma ungabaceleli intethelelo, uma ubacelela intethelelo izikhathi ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi akasoze wabathethelela lokho kungenxa yokuthi bona babengakholwa kuMvelinqangi nesithunywa sakhe futhi uMvelinqangi akabaholi abantu abephula umthetho (abangahloniphi)
